title: title1
desc: No matter the ending is perfect or not, you cannot disappear from my world.

title: title2
desc: 永远不是一种距离,而是一种决定。Eternity is not a distance but a decision.

title: title
desc: The furthest distance in the world is not between life and death.But when I stand in front of you.Yet you don't know that I love you.

title: title3
desc: 距离使两颗心靠得更近.I need him like I need the air to breathe.

title: title
desc: 治疗爱的创伤唯有加倍地去爱.When love is not madness, it is not love.

title: title
desc: 迎着微微的风，像微微的你……

title: title
desc: 我一直明白要和你走一段

title: title
desc: 可惜谁有没有 爱过不是一场 七情上面的雄辩

title: title
desc: The furthest distance in the world is not between life and death.But when I stand in front of you.Yet you don't know that I love you.

title: title
desc: 牵着你在 天空飞翔 这样看世界 不一样
